name: @activeadmin/trumbowyg
description: Trumbowyg WYSIWYG editor integration for ActiveAdmin
author: Mattia Roccoberton <mat@blocknot.es>

scripts.prepare_javascripts_src: rm -rf src && mkdir -p src && cp app/assets/javascripts/activeadmin/trumbowyg_pack.js src/index.js && cp app/assets/javascripts/activeadmin/trumbowyg_input_esm.js src/trumbowyg_input.js
scripts.prepare_stylesheets_src: cp app/assets/stylesheets/activeadmin/trumbowyg/trumbowyg.css src/trumbowyg.css 2>/dev/null || echo 'No CSS to copy'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepare_javascripts_src && npm run prepare_stylesheets_src
